Items.Title: ADB Server
Items.Subtitle: Provides methods for interacting with the adb server.
Items.Description: The adb server is a background process, that runs on the host machine. Its purpose if to sense the USB ports to know when devices are attached/removed, as well as when emulator instances start/stop. The ADB server is really one giant multiplexing loop whose purpose is to orchestrate the exchange of data between clients and devices.
